title: Face Off: Will the Q36.5 Gamble Pay Off or Blow Up for Tom Pidcock?
content:
From big budget WorldTour juggernaut to upstart second-tier crew: We debate whether Pidcock made the right call to leave Ineos Grenadiers.

Read the full article at Face Off: Will the Q36.5 Gamble Pay Off or Blow Up for Tom Pidcock? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
